
##4 byte raw value
WORD, 0, 4, -game:FE6:FE7:FE8 -repeatable -priority:low -indexMode:8
##Value
	Value, 0, 4

##2 byte raw value
SHORT, 0, 2, -game:FE6:FE7:FE8 -repeatable -priority:low -indexMode:8
##Value
	Value, 0, 2

##1 byte raw value
BYTE, 0, 1, -game:FE6:FE7:FE8 -repeatable -priority:low -indexMode:8
##Value
	Value, 0, 1
